scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy:cloudfront
scripts.deploy:s3: aws s3 sync dist/ s3://francklab-homepage-bucket --delete && aws s3 cp dist/index.html s3://francklab-homepage-bucket/index.html --cache-control 'public, max-age=0, must-revalidate' && aws s3 sync dist/assets/ s3://francklab-homepage-bucket/assets/ --cache-control 'public, max-age=31536000, immutable'
scripts.deploy:cloudfront: npm run deploy:s3 && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E13JJEZHZ55AZ --paths '/index.html'
